framework.name: GDPR
framework.description: General Data Protection Regulation - EU Data Privacy Framework

controls.title: Principles Relating to Processing of Personal Data
controls.description: Personal data shall be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently with purpose limitation, data minimization, accuracy, storage limitation, integrity and confidentiality, and accountability

controls.title: Lawfulness of Processing
controls.description: Processing shall be lawful only if at least one of the specified conditions applies (consent, contract, legal obligation, vital interests, public task, legitimate interests)

controls.title: Conditions for Consent
controls.description: Controller must demonstrate consent, consent request must be distinguishable, data subject has right to withdraw consent

controls.title: Transparent Information and Communication
controls.description: Controller shall provide information in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form

controls.title: Information to be Provided When Data is Collected
controls.description: Controller shall provide identity, contact details, purposes, legal basis, recipients, transfers, and retention period

controls.title: Right of Access by the Data Subject
controls.description: Data subject has right to obtain confirmation and access to personal data being processed

controls.title: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
controls.description: Data subject has right to obtain erasure of personal data without undue delay

controls.title: Right to Data Portability
controls.description: Data subject has right to receive personal data in structured, commonly used and machine-readable format

controls.title: Data Protection by Design and by Default
controls.description: Controller shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures for data protection principles

controls.title: Processor
controls.description: Processing by a processor shall be governed by a contract binding the processor to the controller

controls.title: Records of Processing Activities
controls.description: Controller and processor shall maintain records of processing activities under its responsibility

controls.title: Security of Processing
controls.description: Controller and processor shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures including pseudonymisation, encryption, confidentiality, resilience, and testing

controls.title: Notification of Personal Data Breach to Supervisory Authority
controls.description: Controller shall notify supervisory authority within 72 hours of becoming aware of a personal data breach

controls.title: Communication of Personal Data Breach to Data Subject
controls.description: When breach is likely to result in high risk to rights and freedoms, controller shall communicate to data subject

controls.title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
controls.description: Controller shall carry out impact assessment for processing likely to result in high risk

controls.title: Designation of Data Protection Officer
controls.description: Controller and processor shall designate a DPO in certain circumstances

controls.title: General Principle for Transfers
controls.description: Any transfer of personal data to third countries shall comply with GDPR conditions
